intent_atoms.description: Zero-trust telemetry flags must be available before consuming FilesystemAccessAuditTrail events in Wire CLI bookmark flows.
Execute the random slice benchmark suite on macOS hardware once Combine support is available to compare mapped vs. chunked readers under identical workloads.
Run ParseTreeStreamingSelectionAutomationTests on macOS hardware with XCTest UI support to validate end-to-end SwiftUI automation flow.
Execute the Combine-backed UI benchmark on macOS to capture latency metrics while maintaining throughput parity with the CLI harness.
Track outcome of notarized build Apple Events automation assessment and reference final decision in documentation.
